User Description
Chesterfield Style Traditional design with button-tufted accenting, scrolled arms, and turned legs, creating a distinctive and classic look.
Superb Material Premium velvet fabric providing a distinctive soft feeling, enhancing the sofa’s gorgeous, luxurious, and elegant appearance.
Sturdy and Craftsmanship Constructed with a Kikkar wood frame, ensuring sturdiness and durability. Each process in sofa making focuses on perfection.

excerpt.rendered:
Immerse yourself in the timeless allure of our Chesterfield-style seating group, an epitome of classic design. Adorned with meticulous button-tufted detailing, scrolled arms, and gracefully turned legs, this sofa captures the essence of traditional sophistication. The prevalence of these distinctive features makes it impossible to overlook, creating a focal point in any room.

Style Configuration Price
6 Seater Sofa 3,2,1 132,000 PKR
5 Seater Sofa Set 3,2 or 3,1,1 110,000 PKR
3 Seater Sofa Set 3 or 2,1 66,000 PKR
2 Seater Sofa Set 2 or 1,1 44,000 PKR
1 Seater Sofa Set 1 22,000 PKR

Why FurnitureZone:

We always make sure to deliver more than we promised to our customers. we provide a complete warranty for our goods in case of any problem.
